remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated EICAS Advisory message is verified to be operative.

numlitem.para: Use the EICAS advisory level BRAKE SOURCE message for the non-normal checklist procedure in lieu of the BRAKE SOURCE light.

placard.para: Placard Brake Source light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Flight dispatch is permitted with BRAKE SOURCE light inoperative provided the EICAS advisory message is operative.
Start with a powered aircraft and hydraulics on. Ensure parking brake is set.
Select left and right hydraulic sources to OFF from the overhead panel P5.
Verify the BRAKE SOURCE advisory message illuminates on EICAS.
Select left and right hydraulic sources to AUTO from the overhead panel P5.
Verify the BRAKE SOURCE advisory message extinguishes.
